code: import'./News.scss';import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useLocation,NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import{API_URL}from'../../../config/contansts';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const News=()=>{const{pathname}=useLocation();const subcategory_id=pathname.split('/')[2];const[items,setItems]=useState([]);console.log("Promotion/subcategory_id: ",subcategory_id);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/api/whats-new/").concat(subcategory_id)).then(res=>{console.log(res.data);setItems(res.data);}).catch(err=>{console.error(err);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"news-contArea",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"news-length",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:["\uCD1D ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"color-red",children:[items.length,"\uAC74"]}),"\uC758 \uAC8C\uC2DC\uAE00\uC774 \uC788\uC2B5\uB2C8\uB2E4."]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{id:"list",children:items.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:'list-item',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(NavLink,{to:"/whats-new/".concat(subcategory_id,"/").concat(item.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"news-icon",src:"../images/icon/ico_notice.png",alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{className:"item-title",children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:item.created_at})]})},index))})]})})});};export default News;
